text: Hi all: The SANS New2Cyber Summit is this Tuesday, March 14, and offers a virtual component. I encourage you all to sign up for it, even if you cannot attend, as the recordings will be available to registrants afterwards. Although it's a marketing tool for paid SANs courses, there are numerous free resources and perhaps most importantly, a survey of where the field is at now: <https://www.sans.org/cyber-security-training-events/new2cyber-summit-march-2023/>.

elements.text: Hi all: The SANS New2Cyber Summit is this Tuesday, March 14, and offers a virtual component. I encourage you all to sign up for it, even if you cannot attend, as the recordings will be available to registrants afterwards. Although it's a marketing tool for paid SANs courses, there are numerous free resources and perhaps most importantly, a survey of where the field is at now:

attachments.text: Cybersecurity is a fast-growing, dynamic field and SANS mission is to equip you with the skills you need to succeed in the industry. This free live-online event brings together leading experts prepared to share their first-hand knowledge on building a successful career in the field of cyber security. This two day summit will provide you with a complete guide to getting started and access to crucial information, giving you an advantage on the competition when job searching and progressing in you cyber career.
attachments.title: New2Cyber Summit 2023 | SANS Institute
